title: The Journal of Business
aka: University of Chicago Journal of Business

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

preceded-by.note: The Journal of Business of the University of Chicago

additional-note: The January 1954 issue was the first to use 'Journal of Business' alone on the cover, but 'Journal of Business of the University of Chicago' still appeared on some inner pages until later in the year.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
